passwordExchanged.text: Look at your posts in "Conectado", right?.
I didn't expect that from you, it's like it wasn't you writing XD.

phoneFound.text: Look at your comments in the chat. Suface, you surprised us all.
I didn't expect that from you. It's like it wasn't you writing hahaha.

phoneNotFound.text: Looks like you going to need a new mobile phone, right?.
I hope you don't loose that too... or get taken from you.

enough.text: Let's do something. When the classes are over, let's talk where none can hear us.
We talk about it, you apologize and we leave you in peace.
Ana and I will leave you alone and the rest can do what they want.

talked.text: When the class is over, remember to come to the bathrooms.

notTalked.text: No tengo nada que hablar contigo.

talked.text: I have nothing to talk to you.
